Type.Name: Underline

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Underline extends System.Enum

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: This enumeration is used to specify whether text should be underlined, and if so, the type of underlining.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Pango.Underline Double = int32(2)

Docs.summary: A double underline should be drawn

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Pango.Underline Error = int32(4)
.field public static literal valuetype Pango.Underline Low = int32(3)

Docs.summary: A single underline should be drawn at a position beneath the ink extedn of the text being underlined

remarks.para: This should be used only for underlining single characters, such as for keyboard accelerators. should be used for extended portions of text

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Pango.Underline None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype Pango.Underline Single = int32(1)

Docs.summary: A single underline should be drawn
